page.title: 20A School Day.
page.content: Our school starts at 8.55.I get up at 7.30 and have my breakfast and get dressed.About 8.20 I clean my teeth and wash.My friend comes round for me at 8.25 and we walk to school. When we get to school there is usually time to play before the bell goes.After the 1st lesson we have a break at 10.40 and it ends at 11.00. Dinner is at 12.00 if you go home or have a school dinner but you have to wait \ an hour if you eat your own packed lunch.At 1.15 we come inside again. On Mondays there is art or craft and on Wednesday we have games which includes Football,Rounders,Hockey and Netball.Most people like woodwork needlework and games.At 2.15 we have another break that ends at 2.30.School finishes at 3.30.
